r.s: An extension to create PostScript files
r.d: ps is an extension similar to the pdf extension but for creating PostScript files. Its api is modelled after the pdf extension.
r.n: Added function ps_shfill(), ps_shading(), ps_shading_pattern(), ps_get_buffer(). New example files shading.php and image.php. Renamed undocumented function ps_setoverprint() to ps_setoverprintmode().
